PerformancePaintTiming.summary: The PerformancePaintTiming interface provides timing information about "paint" (also called "render") operations during web page construction. "Paint" refers to conversion of the render tree to on-screen pixels.

remarks.para: There are two key paint moments this API provides:
A third key paint moment is provided by the API:

The data this API provides helps you minimize the time that users have to wait before they can see the site's content start to appear. Decreasing the time until these key paint moments make sites feel more responsive, performant, and engaging for your users.
Like other Performance APIs, this API extends .
